Package net.sf.jstuff.core.security

Class ThreadLocalSecureRandom

java.lang.Object
java.util.Random
java.security.SecureRandom
net.sf.jstuff.core.security.ThreadLocalSecureRandom
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, RandomGenerator
public class ThreadLocalSecureRandom extends SecureRandom
Tries to use /dev/urandom (NativePRNGNonBlocking) by default on Unix.
Author:
Sebastian Thomschke
See Also:
